articles.title: BTS Wins Album of the Year at 2021 Mnet Asian Music Awards - Variety

articles.title: French cheese product imported by Cold Storage recalled due to 'possible' presence of bacteria - channelnewsasia.com
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: A cheese product imported from France has been recalled due to the "possible presence" of listeria monocytogenes, a bacteria that can cause foodborne illness. 

The recall for Cantorel’s Plateau 5 Fromages was first issued by a European Commissio…

articles.title: Singapore rolls out first national pancreas transplant service in South-east Asia - The Straits Times
